84827.affected_area: Prince George (Connaught Hill Park, Heritage, South Fort George, & Westwood)
84827.summary: Some customers in the Connaught Hill Park, Heritage, South Fort George, & Westwood areas of Prince George are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
